message.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a spoken or written piece of information that you send to another person or leave for them
message.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He left a message saying he would probably be a little late.
There’s a message from Karen on the answerphone.
I have an urgent message for you.
message.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc
message.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The message of the film is that good always triumphs over evil.
The result of this legal battle sends an important message to people in similar situations.
It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (=communicate what you want to say) without being so angry.
They use illustrations to convey their message.
message.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a piece of written information which appears on a computer screen to tell the user about something, especially a problem
message.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: I keep getting an error message when I try to log on.
